description: Manik Miah, the head culinary specialist from the Windsor Tiffin eatery in Burbage, contributed in the finals of the Curry Chef of the Year competition sorted out by the Bangladesh Caterers Association. He picked a chicken dish, a classical korma – desi khas korma – alongside mint pilaw rice and a vegetable side dish, vegetable salan. He is now considered at the seventh most talented chef among top famous ten chefs in Bangladesh.Asmat Ali, referred to around Gandhi Mahal as Baisab (“sibling” in Bangla), has been head gourmet specialist since 2008. Shelly Nuruzzaman – Top chefs in Bangladesh Shelly’s family moved to Britain in the 1960’s and with them they brought a genuine energy and aptitude for Bangladeshi cooking.
